column4: please name any codec to install for different format music or sounds to play
install ubuntu-restricted-extras package and the w32codecs pack from medibuntu and you will have most of them you need.
install ubuntu-restricted-extras package and the w32codecs pack from medibuntu and you will have most of them you need.
also use the vlc player. and it should play most of them.

install vnc on all the machines and they can see/share/access each others desktops. I use 'ultravnc' on windows normally
